The Secret to Hubbard Comfort

Most shoes come with flimsy, non-supportive insoles. That’s not how we do things. Our removable, triple-density memory foam insoles deliver the perfect blend of comfort and support. You’ll feel the difference right out of the box.

Men’s Boots
Women’s Boots
Men’s Dress
Women’s Casual
Men’s Sneakers
Women’s Sneakers

A Shoemaking Legacy

Our founder, Bruce Katz, pioneered the walking shoe as co-founder of Rockport Shoe Company, and we honor his legacy by crafting high-quality footwear that provides all-day comfort.
Learn More

Every Detail Matters

From heel to toe and ankle to sole, we obsessively engineer every inch of every shoe, which is then handcrafted in small batches in Portugal and Brazil.

Service to Match the Shoes

Need help finding the perfect pair or selecting the right size? Call us and you’ll reach a member of our award-winning customer service team. Every single time.
Contact Us
